alert.note: Alert for Chaves County Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 10 at 10:45PM MDT until July 11 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures between 100 and 103 expected in the Rio Grande Valley and between 105 and 108 degrees expected in Chaves County Plains. * WHERE...Middle Rio Grande Valley including the Albuquerque Metro Area, and Chaves County Plains. * WHEN...From Noon to 8 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses.
info.instruction: Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

area.areaDesc: Chaves County Plains; Middle Rio Grande Valley, Albuquerque Metro Area
